summary: 2 skins for the male Vamp Lord, don\'t like green ? No problem here is a pale white one ,and a pale one with red tattoos !
descriptionHtml:
2 skins for the male Vamp Lord, don\'t like green ? No problem here is a pale white one ,and a pale one with red tattoos ! 

PS; this mod is \'as is\' I\'m sorry, I don\'t mean to disrespect your wishes or trow away good criticism but I would rather put my time is something else, like making my own meshes ;) 

-----

This replaces the vanilla Vamp Lord, so if you\'re still playing trough Dawnguard, be warned. 
(PS I\'m currently not taking request sorreh, I\'m just not motivated enough to mod right now) 

------

Install; 
drop Data from the version you want to use into your Skyrim folder 

un install 
go to \'Data/texture/actors/vampirelord and delete \'vampirelord.dds\' 

-Dawnguard needed 
Thanks to Beth for making this awesome game :)
author: Spacerogue
